description.title: Description
description.description: Description of what this Device does

macros.title: Macros
macros.description: Macros needed to make an instance of this

template.title: Template
template.description: Template file that should be loaded by the IOC

startup.title: Startup
startup.description: Lines to insert into the startup script of IOC

screens.title: Screens
screens.description: List of paths to associated screens

includes.title: Includes
includes.description: YAML files to include in the definitions

local.title: Local
local.description: YAML file that overrides this for local changes

producer.title: Producer
producer.description: The Producer class to make Records and the Device

formatter.title: Formatter
formatter.description: The Formatter class to format the output

components.title: Components
components.description: The Components to pass to the Producer

FloatMacro.title: FloatMacro
FloatMacro.description: BaseModel that adds a type parameter from class name.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Macro that will be passed when instantiated

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of what the Macro will be used for

value.title: Value
value.description: The default value of the parameter, None means required

value.title: Value

IntMacro.description: BaseModel that adds a type parameter from class name.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Macro that will be passed when instantiated

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of what the Macro will be used for

value.title: Value
value.description: The default value of the parameter, None means required

path.title: Path
path.description: Path to the file, can include macros

macros.title: Macros
macros.description: Extra macros to pass along with the macros from this file

AsynProducer.title: AsynProducer
AsynProducer.description: BaseModel that adds a type parameter from class name.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: The prefix for record names created by the template file

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout for the asyn port

APSFormatter.title: APSFormatter
APSFormatter.description: BaseModel that adds a type parameter from class name.

DLSFormatter.title: DLSFormatter
DLSFormatter.description: BaseModel that adds a type parameter from class name.

name.title: Name
name.description: CamelCase name to uniquely identify this component

label.title: Label
label.description: The GUI Label for this, default is name converted to Title Case

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of what this Parameter is for

role.title: Role
role.description:
What role does this parameter play within the device. One of:

    - Readback: a parameter of the device that can be read from.
      E.g. chipTemperature on a detector, or isHomed for a motor
    - Action: a parameter of the device that can be written to, but there
      is no current value.
      E.g. reboot on a detector, or overwriteCurrentPosition for a motor
    - Setting: a parameter of the device that can be written to, the
      current value can be read from, and should be saved/loaded when
      switching between configurations of the device.
      E.g. acquireTime on a detector, or velocity of a motor
    - Transient: a parameter of the device that can be written to and
      read from, but should not be saved/loaded when switching between
      configurations of the device.
      E.g. arrayCounter on a detector, or position of a motor

demand_auto_updates.title: Demand Auto Updates
demand_auto_updates.description: Should demand update when readback changes?

autosave.title: Autosave
autosave.description: Record fields that should be autosaved

read_record_suffix.title: Read Record Suffix
read_record_suffix.description: The read record suffix, if not given then use $(name)_RBV

read_record_scan.title: Read Record Scan
read_record_scan.description: SCAN rate of the read record

write_record_suffix.title: Write Record Suffix
write_record_suffix.description: The write record suffix, if not given then use $(name)

initial.title: Initial
initial.description: The initial value of the parameter

read_widget.title: Read Widget
read_widget.description: Override the widget to use these sort of channels

write_widget.title: Write Widget
write_widget.description: Override the widget to use these sort of channels
